de.lessvoid.nifty.render
Class NiftyImageMode

java.lang.Object
  de.lessvoid.nifty.render.NiftyImageMode

public class NiftyImageMode
extends Object

RenderImageMode supports the following modes. - "normal" (render the given image to the given image size) - "subImage:" (render the given subImage of the image to the given size) - "resize:" (special mode that allows scaling of bitmaps with a predefined schema)

Author:
void
